query:
SELECT p.role, p.secao, p.visualizar, p.inserir, p.excluir
FROM permissoes p
WHERE p.role = 'armazenamento' AND p.secao IN ('home', 'turmas', 'eventos')
ORDER BY p.secao
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT p.role, p.secao, p.visualizar, p.inserir, p.excluir
FROM permissoes p
WHERE p.role = 'armazenamento' AND p.secao IN ('home', 'turmas', 'eventos')
ORDER BY p.secao
